<a href="https://www.brightcellars.com/?utm_campaign=mbrew042721&utm_source=mbrew&utm_medium=mbrew&utm_content=6&n_id=mbrew&a_id=mbrew042721&d=2&sixbtl=bc&bt=859" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Bright Cellars" style="width:100%;max-width: 75px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="75" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8xOC8xNTg5NTc0NTY2LUJDX01CLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6ImNvbWV0LW1vcm5pbmdicmV3IiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0="></a>
</th>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning.</strong> The initial results from the 2020 Census are in, and *drumroll please*...the US population grew 7.4% in the 2010s to 331,449,281 people—the second-slowest growth rate in history. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The new tally will cause some minor shake-ups in the House of Representatives, where each state receives a number of seats proportional to its population. Some highlights:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Texas is gaining two new representatives as political power shifts away from the North. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>California will lose a seat for the first time in its 170-year history as a state.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>New York lost a seat, but it wouldn't have if it had just 89 more residents.</span></li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
AUTO
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/telsa-posts-record-quarterly-profit?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Live From California...It's Tesla Earnings
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/telsa-posts-record-quarterly-profit" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="An illustration of a white Tesla sedan in front of a turquoise background. The tire rims are bedazzled silver dollar signs surrounded set in a gold circle. " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80ODc1L3Rlc2xhLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In between practicing his opening monologue for <em>SNL</em> and firing off dogecoin memes, Tesla CEO Elon Musk manages to do his day job pretty well. Tesla posted a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/26/tesla-tsla-earnings-q1-2021-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">record profit</a> of $438 million and grew revenue 74% annually last quarter.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The car biz is going strong:</strong></span><span> The company previously reported record Q1 deliveries of 184,800, more than doubling that number from last year.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The bitcoin biz is also going strong: </strong></span><span>The company bought $1.5 billion in bitcoin in February before the cryptocurrency climbed to all-time highs in April. It sold about 10% of its bitcoin holdings for a $101 million "positive impact" on profits.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">But if there's one thing we know about Tesla...</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Things are never totally stress-free. Here are two of the many challenges facing the company right now:</p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">China: </strong></span><span>The company is </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/22/tesla-struggles-upsets-china-week?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">playing defense</a></span><span> over its response to customer complaints. Last week, a woman jumped on the roof of a Tesla at the Shanghai Auto Show to protest the company's handling of a crash that injured her parents. The incident was plastered across Chinese social media, embarrassing Tesla in this crucial market for EVs. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Crashes: </strong></span><span>Tesla is facing more than two dozen investigations from federal safety officials into whether its advanced driver-assist system, Autopilot, played a role in recent crashes. Earlier this month, two men died in Texas after their Tesla smashed into a tree—and no one was believed to have been in the driver’s seat. Musk said that Autopilot wasn't enabled during the crash, but many advocates think Tesla doesn't provide enough education around the risks of its self-driving features. </span>
</li>
</ol>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What's next? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Growth, growth, and more growth. This year, Tesla will open gigafactories near Austin, TX, and Berlin, Germany, and later on introduce a pickup and semi-truck.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Tesla's rise to become the world's most valuable auto company has put a target on its bumper. Tesla's market share for all-electric vehicles <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/tesla-tsla-1q-earnings-report-2021-11619318648?mod=hp_lead_pos4&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">decreased</a> from 82% to 70% over the last year, per Cox Automotive. </p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/us-send-60m-astrazeneca-vaccines-foreign-countries?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
US Shares Its Vaccine Leftovers
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/us-send-60m-astrazeneca-vaccines-foreign-countries" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="An illustration of the Earth on a turquoise background with two needles filled with a red serum (symbolizing vaccines) injecting it from either side" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTUwL2NvdmlkLTE5X3ZhY2NpbmUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In the coming months, the White House <a href="https://apnews.com/article/politics-health-business-government-and-politics-coronavirus-26fa41b98fab721218d9a51065351d9d?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">will share</a> up to 60 million doses of AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine with foreign countries, the AP reported yesterday. Once the vaccines clear a regulatory safety review, they could head to areas in need, like India.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">While other countries have been using AstraZeneca's shots for months, the company still hasn't filed for US authorization. And the Biden administration feels confident enough about current vaccine progress with Pfizer, Moderna, and Johnson & Johnson to give up that potential fourth option: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>As of Monday, 29% of Americans are fully vaccinated and almost 43% have gotten at least one shot.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Even with all adults now eligible to receive a shot, vaccine supplies are starting to </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/21/biden-administration-confronts-less-demand-vaccines?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">outstrip demand</a></span><span> in some areas.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> The US initially took the path of "vaccine nationalism"—focusing all efforts on immunizing its own citizens. Now that it has millions of shots to spare, the US is getting back to being a geopolitical busybody, which includes countering China's and Russia's <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/russia-china-are-beating-u-s-vaccine-diplomacy-experts-say-n1262742?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">growing influence</a> in lower-income countries from their own vaccine diplomacy efforts. </p>

<tr>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/onlyfans-grew-revenue-553-pandemic?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
OnlyFans Sees OnlyProfits
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/onlyfans-grew-revenue-553-pandemic" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Woman from Antique Roadshow with text "That's a lot of money"" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=419 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/h78olApnfhKOT8TD3A/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Woman from Antique Roadshow with text " That's a lot of money"" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/h78olApnfhKOT8TD3A/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">OnlyFans revenue <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/6d4562f8-166f-4a89-a3cb-db97123a6cf0?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">popped 553%</a> to ~$390 million in the year to November, after lockdowns left consumers looking for entertainment and out-of-work performers looking for a place to provide it, reports the FT. The London-based platform offers sex workers, fitness influencers, and celebrities like rapper Cardi B an avenue to connect directly with fans and get paid via subscription services plus tips.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">By the numbers: </strong>In addition to massive revenue growth during the pandemic...</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The total value of transactions increased 7x.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Its user base grew from less than 20 million to more than 120 million.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Over 300 creators earned more than $1 million in 2020.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But does NSFW mean not safe in general? Earlier this month, subscribers faced <a href="https://www.papermag.com/bhad-bhabie-onlyfans-2651339785.html?rebelltitem=9#rebelltitem9&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">backlash</a> after rapper Bhad Bhabie broke the OnlyFans record by making $1 million in under six hours, after turning 18 only the week before.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>CEO Tim Stokely, who founded the website in 2016 with his father, told the FT he has no plans to crack down on adult content creators or take the company, which is one of the UK's leading tech startups, public. </p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Each month, <a href="https://www.brightcellars.com/?utm_campaign=mbrew042721&utm_source=mbrew&utm_medium=mbrew&utm_content=6&n_id=mbrew&a_id=mbrew042721&d=2&sixbtl=bc&bt=859" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bright Cellars</a> uses your wine ratings to keep recommending wines that won’t make you whine. <p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You’ll be an expert amongst friends with the wine knowledge you gain, and have access to member’s only discounts on their premium offerings, including sustainable and sparkling wines.</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTHCARE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/mindmed-becomes-us-second-public-psychedelics-company?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Psychedelics Companies Aren’t Far Out
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/mindmed-becomes-us-second-public-psychedelics-company" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="MindMed graphic" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80ODc4L21pbmRtZWRfZ3JhcGhpYy5qcGVnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>MindMed</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">They’re nearer than ever. Psychedelic drug developer MindMed will be listed on the Nasdaq today, becoming the second company <a href="https://www.axios.com/newsletters/axios-pro-rata-2274ebbb-7c56-4d3f-80cf-8504f4e1495f.html?chunk=0&utm_term=emshare#story0&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">of its kind</a> to go public in the US. Compass Pathways is already trading publicly, and Peter Thiel-backed ATAI Life Sciences could make it three: It just filed for an IPO <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/21/atai-ipo-peter-thiel-backed-psychedelics-firm-to-raise-100-million.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">last week</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">According to MindMed CEO JR Rahn, the growth of psychedelics companies is tied to increased awareness of mental health challenges during the pandemic. MindMed’s therapeutics try to improve mental health with treatments that utilize ingredients including MDMA, LSD, and psilocybin of shrooms fame. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">But don’t compare it to cannabis. </strong></span><span>“Our company’s objective is not to make your Burning Man experience more pleasurable, our objective is to treat mental health,” Rahn told us.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Efforts to remove red tape from the industry are gaining steam. In November, Oregon became the <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/04/oregon-becomes-first-state-to-legalize-magic-mushrooms-as-more-states-ease-drug-laws.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">first state</a> to legalize the medical use of psilocybin, and other jurisdictions are moving in that direction. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Don’t expect to cure your anxiety by taking MindMed’s meds in the woods with friends. “Therapists are going to be a key component of making this whole new approach work,” Rahn said. </p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">

GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/26/key-performance-indicators-april-27?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

Key Performance Indicators

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>Last month, the cheapest rental car on Maui was a Toyota Camry that cost <a href="https://www.hawaiinewsnow.com/2021/04/22/why-are-visitors-cruising-around-u-hauls-blame-pandemic/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$722 a day</a>, according to Hawaii News Now. Rental cars are getting so outrageously expensive in the state that tourists are renting U-Hauls just to get around. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>"When S&S chose to sign Mike Pence, we broke the public's trust in our editorial process, and blatantly contradicted previous public claims in support of Black and other lives made vulnerable by structural oppression."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">—216 employees of Simon & Schuster, representing about 14% of its workforce, sent a letter demanding that it <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/simon-schuster-employees-submit-petition-demanding-no-deals-with-trump-administration-authors-11619449307?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stop publishing books</a> from authors associated with the Trump administration, according to the WSJ. CEO Jonathan Karp has already pushed back against employee objections to publishing a book by former VP Mike Pence, <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/simon-schuster-says-mike-pence-book-will-proceed-despite-employee-petition-11618948424?mod=article_inline&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">saying</a>, "We come to work each day to publish, not cancel."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>How Mark Zuckerberg and Tim Cook became foes. (<a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/26/technology/mark-zuckerberg-tim-cook-facebook-apple.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">NYT</a>)</p>

ENTERTAINMENT

<img alt="Oscar TV viewership 2014-2021 chart" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80ODc3L29zY2FyX3ZpZXdlcnNoaXAucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Morning Brew <a href="https://twitter.com/MorningBrew/status/1386749882329931776?s=20" class="link" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Twitter</a></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Ratings for the Academy Awards have been dipping since 2014, but the pandemic did a number on this year's audience—only <a href="https://deadline.com/2021/04/2021-0scars-tv-ratings-academy-awards-low-abc-disney-1234744135/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">9.85 million viewers</a> tuned in Sunday night, a 58% plunge from the year before and a new record low. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The good news is that only 3x more people watched the Oscars this weekend than are subscribed to Morning Brew. We'll get there.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
BREW'S BETS
</h3>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">

The tire rims are bedazzled silver dollar signs surrounded set in a gold circle. \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80ODc1L3Rlc2xhLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19\"\u003e\n\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn between practicing his opening monologue for \u003cem\u003eSNL\u003c/em\u003e and firing off dogecoin memes, Tesla CEO Elon Musk manages to do his day job pretty well. Tesla posted a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/26/tesla-tsla-earnings-q1-2021-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erecord profit\u003c/a\u003e of $438 million and grew revenue 74% annually last quarter.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe car biz is going strong:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e The company previously reported record Q1 deliveries of 184,800, more than doubling that number from last year.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe bitcoin biz is also going strong: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe company bought $1.5 billion in bitcoin in February before the cryptocurrency climbed to all-time highs in April. It sold about 10% of its bitcoin holdings for a $101 million \"positive impact\" on profits.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eBut if there's one thing we know about Tesla...\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThings are never totally stress-free. Here are two of the many challenges facing the company right now:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eChina: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe company is \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/22/tesla-struggles-upsets-china-week?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eplaying defense\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e over its response to customer complaints. Last week, a woman jumped on the roof of a Tesla at the Shanghai Auto Show to protest the company's handling of a crash that injured her parents. The incident was plastered across Chinese social media, embarrassing Tesla in this crucial market for EVs. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCrashes: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTesla is facing more than two dozen investigations from federal safety officials into whether its advanced driver-assist system, Autopilot, played a role in recent crashes. Earlier this month, two men died in Texas after their Tesla smashed into a tree—and no one was believed to have been in the driver’s seat. Musk said that Autopilot wasn't enabled during the crash, but many advocates think Tesla doesn't provide enough education around the risks of its self-driving features. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat's next? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGrowth, growth, and more growth. This year, Tesla will open gigafactories near Austin, TX, and Berlin, Germany, and later on introduce a pickup and semi-truck.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eTesla's rise to become the world's most valuable auto company has put a target on its bumper. Tesla's market share for all-electric vehicles \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/tesla-tsla-1q-earnings-report-2021-11619318648?mod=hp_lead_pos4\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edecreased\u003c/a\u003e from 82% to 70% over the last year, per Cox href=\"https://apnews.com/article/politics-health-business-government-and-politics-coronavirus-26fa41b98fab721218d9a51065351d9d?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" countries, the AP reported yesterday. Once the vaccines clear a regulatory safety review, they could head to areas in need, like India.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhile other countries have been using AstraZeneca's shots for months, the company still hasn't filed for US authorization. And the Biden administration feels confident enough about current vaccine progress with Pfizer, Moderna, and Johnson \u0026 Johnson to give up that potential fourth option: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAs of Monday, 29% of Americans are fully vaccinated and almost 43% have gotten at least one shot.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eEven with all adults now eligible to receive a shot, vaccine supplies are starting to \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/04/21/biden-administration-confronts-less-demand-vaccines?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eoutstrip demand\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in some areas.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e The US initially took the path of \"vaccine nationalism\"—focusing all efforts on immunizing its own citizens. Now that it has millions of shots to spare, the US is getting back to being a geopolitical busybody, which includes countering China's and Russia's \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/russia-china-are-beating-u-s-vaccine-diplomacy-experts-say-n1262742?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egrowing influence\u003c/a\u003e in lower-income countries from their own vaccine diplomacy style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOnlyFans revenue \u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/6d4562f8-166f-4a89-a3cb-db97123a6cf0?utm_source=morning_brew\" after lockdowns left consumers looking for entertainment and out-of-work performers looking for a place to provide it, reports the FT. The London-based platform offers sex workers, fitness influencers, and celebrities like rapper Cardi B an avenue to connect directly with fans and get paid via subscription services plus tips.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBy the numbers: \u003c/strong\u003eIn addition to massive revenue growth during the pandemic...\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe total value of transactions increased 7x.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIts user base grew from less than 20 million to more than 120 million.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOver 300 creators earned more than $1 million in 2020.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut does NSFW mean not safe in general? Earlier this month, subscribers faced \u003ca href=\"https://www.papermag.com/bhad-bhabie-onlyfans-2651339785.html?rebelltitem=9#rebelltitem9\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebacklash\u003c/a\u003e after rapper Bhad Bhabie broke the OnlyFans record by making $1 million in under six hours, after turning 18 only the week before.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eCEO Tim Stokely, who founded the website in 2016 with his father, told the FT he has no plans to crack down on adult content creators or style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eMindMed\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThey’re nearer than ever. Psychedelic drug developer MindMed will be listed on the Nasdaq today, becoming the second company \u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/newsletters/axios-pro-rata-2274ebbb-7c56-4d3f-80cf-8504f4e1495f.html?chunk=0\u0026utm_term=emshare#story0\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eof its kind\u003c/a\u003e to go public in the US. Compass Pathways is already trading publicly, and Peter Thiel-backed ATAI Life Sciences could make it three: It just filed for an IPO \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/04/21/atai-ipo-peter-thiel-backed-psychedelics-firm-to-raise-100-million.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elast week\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAccording to MindMed CEO JR Rahn, the growth of psychedelics companies is tied to increased awareness of mental health challenges during the pandemic. MindMed’s therapeutics try to improve mental health with treatments that utilize ingredients including MDMA, LSD, and psilocybin of shrooms fame. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBut don’t compare it to cannabis. \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e“Our company’s objective is not to make your Burning Man experience more pleasurable, our objective is to treat mental health,” Rahn told us.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eEfforts to remove red tape from the industry are gaining steam. In November, Oregon became the \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/11/04/oregon-becomes-first-state-to-legalize-magic-mushrooms-as-more-states-ease-drug-laws.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efirst state\u003c/a\u003e to legalize the medical use of psilocybin, and other jurisdictions are moving in that direction. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eDon’t expect to cure your anxiety by taking MindMed’s meds in the woods with friends. “Therapists are going to be a key component of making this whole new approach work,” Rahn
